meanings.definition: Resembling a pipe in shape or function.
meanings.sent1: The long, pipelike structure carried water across the field.
meanings.sent2: The pipelike tube was used to transport gas from one place to another.
meanings.sent3: The pipelike design of the straw made it easy to sip the drink.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back in a pipelike fashion.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar moved in a slow, pipelike motion along the branch.
